sectiondef.header: Constructors, destructors, and other standard methods

briefdescription.para: Return information about the position in the beam.
An array of coordinates for each element.
Initialize m_cueSize value based on the @cue attribute and presence of child elements with @cue attributes.
Initialize m_notesStemDir value based on the @graceGrp attribute and presence of child elements with @grace attributes.
Checks whether difference between highest and lowest notes of the beam is just one step.
Get total beam width with regards to the shortest duration of the beam (counting both beams and whitespace between them)
Clear the m_beamElementCoords vector and delete all the objects.
Helper to find number of additional beams.

detaileddescription.para: Return { additional beams above main beam, additional beams below }

briefdescription.para: Helper to get number of beams represented by attributes @beam and @beam.float.
Get above/below overflow for the children.
Return the position of the element in the beam.

detaileddescription.para: For notes, lookup the position of the parent chord.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< int > &items, const std::vector< data_BEAMPLACE > &directions) const
memberdef.name: IsHorizontalMixedBeam

briefdescription.para: Determines whether beam should be horizontal based on item positions and relative beam place.

detaileddescription.para: Should be used with mixed beams, where beam place can be different for separate elements

briefdescription.para: This class is an interface for MEI beam elements (beam, beamSpan).

detaileddescription.para: It stores stem drawing values. It is also an ObjectListInterface.
